Crafts & Visual Arts/Posters - Design and construction
description: A poster sells a product or an idea. It has a single concept; it must be an instant visual communication to impress and motivate the viewer to act on the message. The greatest change in posters is movement - commercials on television are posters in motion. Shows numerous examples of traditional and modern posters.
